Text: I follow your HowTo precisely but it still says, "Wrong CD" when I try to run the game.

I did exactely as the thign told me it run all the wya up to where it should be on the menu and then it says it encountered a problem and t shuts off. i am using windows XP SP3 help? please?
same thing happens to me it crashes goddamnit
Yeah I have a problem launching as well. I've tried running in compatibility mode down to win98 with the same results. (windows 7) Even tried it in XP Mode (virtual PC) with no luck. Ideas?
Same problem here.  Crashes after intro videos and a few seconds of menu music.  XP SP3.  Solutions?

If your game crashes on startup (WinXP):

1. Install the game.
2. Apply the patch (use browse, and remember where the patch went, notice that it installs to folder/folder/DOWNLOADS).
3. Go to where you installed the patch, inside the DOWNLOAD folder you will have files, COPY them to Cataclysm install folder (overwrite). 
4. Now go to torrented files and copy cataclysm.exe  (overwrite)

The solution is simple,the patch does not APPLY the patch. It only EXTRACTS the files to a folder. You have to manually copy the files to patch the game and then apply the crecked *.exe.
